QuestData.Title: The Scent of Blood
QuestData.Description: I'm afraid that I wet my hands with saurok blood while you were away.$B$BI'm sorry, but I could not help myself. Now, watch them attack me.$B$BPitiful!$B$BDo they think to take vengeance for their fallen? Do they come challenge ME?$B$BI, who have won a hundred wars? I, who stood alone against thousands and still shouted for my enemies to come?$B$BNo, these... saurok... will crumple before me like paper before the flame!$B$BI shall show you my might, Wakener. Fight alongside me and see.$B$BHere they come!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Muckscale Flesheaters and the Muckscale Serpentus.
QuestData.RewardText: You have succeeded once again. Well done, Wakener.
